articles.author: Ellen Nakashima
articles.title: Russia’s election influence efforts show sophistication, officials say - The Washington Post
articles.description: Moscow is using “authentic U.S. voices” on major social media platforms to “launder” propaganda and divisive narratives aimed at swaying American audiences.
articles.content: The Russian governments covert efforts to sway the 2024 presidential election are more advanced than in recent years, and the most active foreign threat this political season, U.S. intelligence offic… [+7014 chars]
